title: Nuclear Fallout Simulator
description: Created an advanced, offline-capable simulation tool for analyzing nuclear fallout effects. This application provides critical data visualizations and geographical outputs, demonstrating expertise in developing secure, self-contained systems for specialized analysis.

title: EEG Signal Classification
description: An intelligent application developed to assist the critical task of EEG signal classification, specifically for the detection of epileptic seizures. This system provides a robust and efficient diagnostic support tool by analyzing complex neurological data in real-time.

title: LearnMate - Skill Exchange System
description: A dynamic barter platform where users can exchange skills without any monetary transactions. The application matches users based on their desired skills, featuring a chat interface and a booking system to facilitate smooth, direct skill swaps.

title: Trip Planner
description: A mobile application designed to simplify trip planning and create lasting travel memories. The app allows users to create personalized itineraries, capture and organize snapshots of their journeys, and receive location-based suggestions for nearby attractions and activities.

title: Marg Darshak
description: Developed a scalable, AI-powered traffic prediction and strategic route optimization system. This application uses machine learning to simulate urban congestion and reduce emergency response times, demonstrating a direct, positive impact on city management.

title: EmoSense
description: A secure mental health monitoring platform created to provide a safe space for journaling and a 24/7 NLP-based chatbot for emotional support. Its core feature is the implementation of robust, defense-grade encryption protocols to ensure data privacy and integrity.

title: BookWise - Library Management System
description: A comprehensive library management system built to streamline online library operations. The application allows users to perform all basic functions, such as searching, borrowing, and returning books, providing a digital solution for efficient library administration.
